attributes.action: Build a community centre in the mahon area to make peace.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our area is called The Mahon and was once a lovely and quiet estate but it has made a big change, because of the troubles in past years people have stated fighting in our streets , it has became very grubby and no - one ever stops fighting among themselves, it has became a war zone. So a community centre could give The Mahon and other close areas such as Orchard Estate a chance to regain their cleanliness and peace.
